üìÑ Protocols:
Note: There was a mistranslation between Epithalon and Epithalamin. Epithalamin is an extract of Epithalon and is less concentrated. 
The original studies in Russia and Ukraine actually used Epithalamin, that is why the dose is 10 mg. 
The equal Epithalon dose is 100 mcg. 

The protocols below are adjusted accordingly. 10 mg of Epithalamin = 100 mcg of Epithalon.
IM or SQ:
‚Ä¢ 100 mcg daily for 10 days done twice a year (total of 100 mg) (Dr. Seeds)
‚Ä¢ 100 mcg every third day until you reach 50 mg total (The Ukrainian Protocol, original study by the Ukraine Academy Medical Sciences) 
‚Ä¢ 100 mcg every 3 days for 15 days (Tailor Made Compounding Catalog)
‚Ä¢ 100 mcg three times a week for 3 weeks done once a year (The Ukrainian Protocol, original study by the Ukraine Academy Medical Sciences) 

Epithalon is often stacked with Thymalin:
IM (some do SQ):
‚Ä¢ 5 mg thymalin and 5 mg epithalamine daily for 20 days, repeating every 6 months (Jay Campbell)
üìù Notes:
LINK
‚Ä¢ There exists a mistranslation between Epithalon and Epithalamin
‚Ä¢ Epithalamin is an extract of Epitalon and is less concentrated, so need to take 100 mcg of Epithalon instead of 10 mg of Epithalamin
‚Ä¢ Similar translation issue exists for Thymogen and Thymalin
‚Ä¢ Long-term results, but they may start showing up after the course is already done
